flavor: Ha visto più violenza di quanta ne veda la maggior parte della gente nell'arco di una vita.
name: Coltello da Trincea
text: Le azioni di impegno che effettui non provocano attacchi di opportunità. [action]: Combatti. Ricevi +X [combat] in questo attacco, dove X è il numero di nemici impegnati con te.

name: Ambush
text: Attach to your location. If there are no investigators at attached location, discard Ambush. Forced - After an enemy spawns at attached location: Deal 2 damage to that enemy and discard Ambush.

name: Charles Ross, Esq.
text: You may spend resources to pay for Item assets played by other investigators at your location. [free] Exhaust Charles Ross, Esq.: Reduce the cost of the next Item asset played by an investigator at your location by 1.

name: Forewarned
text:
Fast. Play when you draw a non-weakness treachery card.
Place 1 of your clues on your location. Then, cancel that card's revelation effect.

name: Dario El-Amin
text:
Finché possiedi 10 o più risorse, ricevi +1 [willpower] e +1 [intellect].
[action] Se non ci sono nemici nel tuo luogo, esaurisci Dario El-Amin: Ottieni 2 risorse.

name: Sneak Attack
text: Deal 2 damage to an enemy not engaged with you at your location.

name: Tempesta di Spiriti
text: Combatti. Usa [will] invece di [combat]. Se hai successo, invece dei danni standard, infliggi 2 danni a ogni nemico nel tuo luogo (gli eventuali danni aggiuntivi sono inflitti al nemico attaccato). Se riveli un simbolo [skull], [cultist]. [tablet], [elder_thing] o [auto_fail], infliggi 1 danno a ogni investigatore nel tuo luogo.

name: Book of Shadows
text: [action] Exhaust Book of Shadows and spend 1 resource: Add 1 charge to a [[Spell]] asset you control.

name: Fight or Flight
text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Until the end of the round, you get +X [combat] and +X [agility], where X is the amount of horror on you.

flavor: With or without hope, all you can do is resist.
name: A Test of Will
text:
Fast. Play when an investigator at your location draws a non-weakness treachery card.
Cancel that card's revelation effect. Exile A Test of Will.

name: Devil's Luck
text:
Fast. Play when you are dealt damage and/or horror.
Cancel up to 10 damage and/or horror just dealt to you. Exile Devil's Luck.

flavor: "Operator, I’m gonna need you to hang up."
name: Calling in Favors
text: Choose an [[Ally]] asset you control and return it to your hand. Then, search the top 9 cards of your deck for an [[Ally]] asset and play it, reducing its cost by X. X is the cost of the [[Ally]] asset returned to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
